locationError.message:
Невозможно определить ваше текущее местоположение.

Расширение будет использовать 18:30 как время заката для каждого дня.
locationError.description: If the system cannot determine the location, this is shown in an alert window.

nextYear.description: hold Shift and press right arrow key

noLocationAvailable.description: If the system does not know the location of this computer.

noLocationName.description: If the internet is not available, to get the name of the current location.

otherDays.description: used in top left 'Upcoming' list, when the event is more than 1 day in the future (see 1day)

pm.description: displayed in 'timeFormat12' if not using 24 hours clock

pressKeyOrClick.description: tooltip on buttons for sample date formats. The {0} will get the letter to press
